"White Bright Christmas":
"Thank you for making all of our wishes
come true. With that taken care of,
we can now consider our surroundings.
Now, what is the meaning of this outfit?
Hmm... It relates to an event about
bringing happiness to people?
And your wish is to train to defend it?
Very well. Go to it.
※Clear on Hard or higher.
※Trigger Quests do count"
